item.title: Front-end development responsibilities as a (back-end) software engineer
item.description: As a front end developer I agree with this. Good b… Alejandro Magnorsky - Mar 4, 2014 As a front end developer I agree with this. Good back-end development and use of new technologies make the work for the front end developer easier, faster and better.

item.title: Front-end development responsibilities as a (back-end) software engineer
item.description: What seems to be predominant in the industry today is a fixation on a software engineer simply creating (yes creating, maybe we’ll discuss the importance of this verb for another blog post) products that solve a specific business problem (or requirement). While this is good from the outset. It raises several questions of the responsibility of a software engineer to begin with. Before I get into the real content of this blog post, I would like to share with you my current working environment, so you can analyse any predisposed prejudices I may or may not have.
